sourcesContent:
import useFormValidation from "../../utils/useFormValidation";
import PopupWithForm from "../PopupWithForm/PopupWithForm";

export default function AddPlacePopup({ isOpen, onClose, onAddPlace, isSend }) {

  const { values, errors, isValid, isInputValid, handleChange, resetValidation, setValue } = useFormValidation


  function resetAfterClose() {
    onClose()
    resetValidation({ username: currentUser.name, description: currentUser.about })
  }

  return (
    <PopupWithForm
        name='add_card'
        title='Новое место'
        buttonTitle='Создать'
        isOpen={isOpen}
        onClose={resetAfterClose}
      >
        <label className="popup__input-label">
          <input
            required=""
            minLength={2}
            maxLength={30}
            className="popup__input popup__input_card-name"
            id="card-name"
            name="name"
            placeholder="Название"
            type="text"
          />
          <span id="card-name-error" className="popup__error" />
        </label>
        <label className="popup__input-label">
          <input
            required=""
            type="url"
            className="popup__input popup__input_card-link"
            id="card-link"
            name="link"
            placeholder="Ссылка на картинку"
          />
          <span id="card-link-error" className="popup__error" />
        </label>
      </PopupWithForm>
    )
}
